description:
Sweepr HD is a sweepstakes "to-do" app that helps with managing sweepstakes, giveaways, contests and more.

Organize, Enter, WIN! Sweepr HD is a sweepstakes "to-do" app that helps with managing sweepstakes, giveaways, contests and more. Based on the type of sweep it is (once, daily, weekly, etc), Sweepr HD makes sweeping much easier!

Sweepr is also available for webOS phones on the App Catalog!

1.5.0
New Features
-Sort (alphabetical, end date, next date, type)
-Editing Sweeps

Changes
-Cleaner and more efficient UI
-Support info added
-Preferences added

1.1.0 | 12/21/2011
Features
-Adding sweeps
-Deleting sweeps
